lead_paragraph: Despite losing a second straight game on Monday the Detroit Lions still have a chance to punch their post-season ticket as NFL teams scramble for playoff positioning heading into the final game of the regular season.

headline.print_headline: Lions Still in Hunt for Post-Season Ticket
headline.main: Lions Still in Hunt for Post-Season Ticket
